channel.title: Cost - BRANDNAQUA (genre?)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/user-585857648/cost
hey guys I recorded a lil demo that i’m gonna incorporate into my project called “ICON”.
Take a listen if ya’ll want ❤️ plus play if you wanna play with the project here it is:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/vlzD3-aD2YqgY1F8BAisdQ==
it’s simple, i’ll share some more that are viable stand alone that could be exciting to mess with
Cost - LYRICS
skip school all to build up a collection of IP
bad boys I look up to say it’s really unlikely that i’ll reach my dreams
statistically, we’re talking
move your pen, but can you walk it
character traits, missions, unlock it
keep going there’s no stopping
move your body to the drum ooo
awakening, never numb
feeling fine I promise you
hustla! doing what I gotta do
chorus:
nothing’s free in life
you see there is a cost
trading all my time for assets I build on
but when the challenges come
you know that I take em on
unzipping my pants
grab my phone, takin them off
do it for the money
you can’t drop the ball
give up every part of you
image and all
okay
unveiling every “flaw”
think money is the answer
but there’s a cost
and when you’re an ICON
that they’ve got their eyes on
I hope you’re happy in your skin, silence all talk
shutter over here
over there, every where
they’ll never see you crying cuz they’re looking at your hair
*end of chorus*
all lights and smiles, follow what you see on screen
i’m blue, indigo, got soul in me
send in your assessments without ever knowing me
I’ll take the lead, i’ll walk it
paths for you and me - free
LGBT Q
all, every color and hue, BOLD brilliance
side to side with a jump uh
electric mind, never dumb
feeling fine I promise you
ICON, doing what I gotta do
(chorus)
you see, God 1st and everything is after
they’re laughing at you, so make money off their laughter
they wanna see so you put on a show
and after that back to your room all alone
you see, I bleed, I cry
no matter where I go I can only be so high
no matter where I’ve been, I can never run and hide
you wanna be an star, living an ICONIC life
nothing’s free in life
we all pay a different price
live on different sets
making different sacrifices
but may our virtues outweigh our vices
every stranger can have my kindness
curious eyes, pupils widest
look to the shine, but don’t be blinded
we are ICONS from the day that we are born til the day we’re gone & beyond

item.title: Cost - BRANDNAQUA (genre?)
item.dc:creator: brandnaqua
item.description:
https://soundcloud.com/user-585857648/cost

hey guys I recorded a lil demo that i’m gonna incorporate into my project called “ICON”.

Take a listen if ya’ll want plus play if you wanna play with the project here it is:

https://app.auxy.co/projects/vlzD3-aD2YqgY1F8BAisdQ==

it’s simple, i’ll share some more that are viable stand alone that could be exciting to mess with

Cost - LYRICS

skip school all to build up a collection of IP

bad boys I look up to say it’s really unlikely that i’ll reach my dreams

statistically, we’re talking

move your pen, but can you walk it

character traits, missions, unlock it

keep going there’s no stopping

move your body to the drum ooo

awakening, never numb

feeling fine I promise you

hustla! doing what I gotta do

chorus:

nothing’s free in life

you see there is a cost

trading all my time for assets I build on

but when the challenges come

you know that I take em on

unzipping my pants

grab my phone, takin them off

do it for the money

you can’t drop the ball

give up every part of you

image and all

okay

unveiling every “flaw”

think money is the answer

but there’s a cost

and when you’re an ICON

that they’ve got their eyes on

I hope you’re happy in your skin, silence all talk

shutter over here

over there, every where

they’ll never see you crying cuz they’re looking at your hair

all lights and smiles, follow what you see on screen

I’ll take the lead, i’ll walk it

feeling fine I promise you

ICON, doing what I gotta do

(chorus)

you see, God 1st and everything is after

they’re laughing at you, so make money off their laughter

and after that back to your room all alone

you see, I bleed, I cry

no matter where I go I can only be so high

no matter where I’ve been, I can never run and hide

you wanna be an star, living an ICONIC life

nothing’s free in life

we all pay a different price

live on different sets

making different sacrifices

but may our virtues outweigh our vices

every stranger can have my kindness

curious eyes, pupils widest

look to the shine, but don’t be blinded

we are ICONS from the day that we are born til the day we’re gone & beyond
